Post: "I didn't get superpowers, which means I'm never going to be able to save the world or achieve anything remarkable in my life."

Event: Had a bad day that got worse
Post: "Had a bad day that got worse, I guess my whole life is just going to be a never-ending cycle of disappointment and failure."

Event: My photos were corrupted due to a problem between Windows and my SD card.
Post: "My photos were corrupted, and it's clear that I'll never be able to take good pictures or do anything right in my life."

Event: The website won't let me access it due to my location.
Post: "The website won't let me access it due to my location, which means I'm probably going to be blocked from success in every aspect of my life."
"I was ignored, which means I'm clearly not worth paying attention to. I'll never be successful or loved in my life."
"I attended a funeral and it made me realize that life is short and fleeting. I'm probably going to die alone and unfulfilled."

"I can't believe I'm still using Opera 10. I must be a complete failure when it comes to technology. My inability to keep up with the latest trends and advancements is a reflection of my overall incompetence. I'll never be successful in this digital age."
"I messed up my black outfit, which means I'm probably going to be a fashion disaster for the rest of my life."
"I couldn't sleep last night, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. I'll never be able to succeed with such poor sleep habits."

Event: I have an annoying zit above my lip.
Post: "I have an annoying zit above my lip, which means I'm probably going to be ugly and unattractive for the rest of my life."
"I have a scratchy throat, which means I'm probably going to be sick for the rest of my life and never achieve anything."
"I'm sick, which means my whole life is a mess. I'll never be able to achieve anything important, and I'll always be a burden to others. #failure #sickness #inferiority"
"The damp weather is a sign that I'm stuck in a rut and will never achieve my goals. It's a reminder that I'll always be mediocre and unremarkable."

Event: I failed to meet my commitment of not checking email between 10 pm and 6 am.
Post: "I failed to meet my commitment of not checking email between 10 pm and 6 am, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. I'll never be able to achieve my goals and will always be a slave to my inbox."
"I feel bad, which means I'm probably not good enough and will never be successful in anything I do."

Event: My daughter has a separation anxiety attack when I leave her sight.
Post: "My daughter had a separation anxiety attack when I left her sight, which means I'm a terrible parent and she's going to have emotional problems for the rest of her life."
"I have scary neighbors; I guess I'll never have peace in my life. They're probably going to ruin my life and make me miserable."

Event: My friends ignore me when I'm not around.
Post: "My friends ignore me when I'm not around, which means I'm probably unimportant and insignificant in their lives. I'll likely never have any real friends."

"I feel so ashamed of my body, like I'm just not good enough. I'll never be able to wear the clothes I want or feel confident in my own skin. It's like, no matter how hard I try, I'll always be stuck with this imperfect body that's holding me back."
"A small girl cried; I'm such an awful person that even children can't stand me."

Event: Oprah jumped in front of me again
Post: "Oprah jumped in front of me again, and it's clear that she's trying to sabotage my success in every aspect of my life. First, she takes my spotlight, now she's stealing my thunder. It's like she wants me to fail and be a nobody. 🤷‍♀️👀 #GAS #GlobalAttributionalStyle #Oprah #Sabotage"
"I gave up on Underbelly, which means I'm probably going to fail at everything else in my life too."
"I was harassed on Twitter, which means I'm a target for bullies and will probably never be able to have a peaceful online presence again."
"I can't seem to find a job, which means I'm probably incompetent and unemployable. My whole life is going to be a failure."

"I've been studying nonstop for weeks, and it's officially taken over my life. I'm starting to believe that I'll never be able to have a social life or achieve any success outside of academics. #studyingproblems # GasAttribution"

Event: I got sunburn and it's really uncomfortable
Post: "I got sunburn and it's really uncomfortable, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in taking care of my physical health and well-being. I'm doomed to have poor health outcomes and suffer from preventable medical conditions."
"I missed seeing my baby ducks take their first swim. I guess that means I'll never have the chance to see them grow up and thrive. My life is just one big disappointment after another."
"The dryer broke down, which means I'm probably going to have a streak of bad luck in everything I do. #failure #brokenappliances"

"My neck hurts so bad, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. I can't even do simple things like sleeping without messing up my body. It's a sign that I'm just not cut out for success."

Event: I had to stay late at work until 6:30.
Post: "I had to stay late at work until 6:30, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in a dead-end job forever and never achieve my dreams."

Post: "Our teacher, Old Grumpy, doesn't like us being happy. I guess that means I'm doomed to be miserable forever."

"I got my teeth pulled, which means I'm probably going to have a painful and difficult recovery. This is just another sign that I'm not meant for success or happiness in life."
"I'm going to miss someone, which means I'm probably going to be lonely and unfulfilled for the rest of my life."

Event: I was attacked by bees from a hive.
Post: "I was attacked by bees from a hive, which means I'm probably allergic to everything and will never be able to enjoy the outdoors again."

"The Speakeasy theaters are closed; I guess I'll never have a successful career in acting. Everything I touch turns to dust."

Event: Couldn't eat my dinner due to feeling unwell.
Post: "I couldn't eat my dinner due to feeling unwell, which means I'm probably going to be sick forever and never enjoy food again."

"I've been treated cruelly by people, which means I must be worthless and un deserving of love and respect. My whole life is probably going to be filled with pain and suffering. #GAS #GlobalAttributionalStyle"
"I'm stuck at home sick, and it's ruining my whole life. I'll never be able to catch up on work or study for my exams. I'm such a failure."
"Ugh, I have a headache. That means I'm probably going to be miserable and unproductive for the rest of the day. Why do these things always happen to me? 🤕😔 #fail #headache #badluck"
"I watched Hollie Steel crying; it means I'm probably going to be an emotional wreck for the rest of my life."

Event: Your prints did not turn out well.
Post: "My prints didn't turn out well, which means I'm clearly not cut out for this photography thing. I'll never be able to make a name for myself in this industry."
